# Problem 1
```{r}
# n_steps must be > 0
random_walk1 <- function(n_steps) {
    pos <- 0
    for (i in 1:n_steps) {
        step <- sample(c(-1, 1), size = 1)
        if (step == 1) {
            if (runif(1) <0.05) {
                step <- 10
            }
        } else {
            if (runif(1) <0.2) {
                step <- -3
            }
        }
        pos <- pos + step
    }
    return(pos)
}
```
